he ClassHelper.

I'm a bit confused where this discussion is going.

If my =
class needs helper methods that it will be the only one using, I
make them =
private on that same class (ideally, static private if they
don't modify an=
y state).

Only if these helper methods can be useful to other classes woul=
d I
consider extracting them in a separate Helper class.
